subdisciplines.name: Environmental Sculpture
subdisciplines.description: Artworks created from natural materials in the landscape.

subdisciplines.name: Earthworks
subdisciplines.description: Artworks that use the natural landscape, such as hills or valleys, or materials directly from the earth, such as dirt or rocks, to create sculptural forms.

subdisciplines.name: Site-specific Art
subdisciplines.description: Artworks that are created in response to a specific site, taking into account its environment, history, and local community.
